trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a workflow or activity is in an invalid state.
trans-unit.target: 当工作流或活动处于无效状态时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.ValidationException"></xref> class using default values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Activities.ValidationException"></xref>类使用默认值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.ValidationException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Activities.ValidationException"></xref>与指定的错误消息的类。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.ValidationException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Activities.ValidationException"></xref>用序列化数据的类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>它保存关于所引发异常的序列化的对象数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>它包含有关源或目标的上下文信息。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.ValidationException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Activities.ValidationException"></xref>使用指定的错误消息和对导致此异常的内部异常的引用的类。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) if no inner exception is specified.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常，则为 null 引用异常 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中) 如果未指定内部异常是。
